name: Jigsaw Puzzles: Christmas Games
description:
This game is a collection of original jigsaw puzzles that can be solved on the go! Colorful themed pictures and pleasant music will help you forget everyday worries and immerse yourself into the relaxing atmosphere of the game.

Features:
- beautiful, high-definition puzzles
- hundreds of images grouped in themes
- themes available: Animals, Cars, Landscapes, Kids, Christmas and much more
- work on more than one puzzle at a time and see your progress
- natural interface that is simple and easy to use
- easy preview of the images

Put your worries aside and let the images bring you into a wonderful world!
